Package model

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Rect
      • model.Ball
  • public class Ball
extends Rect
    The ball is actually a rectangle. Turns out the physics of the ball is just in swapping xDir / yDir to make it change directions.
    Author:
    Leo_Le
